products-refs.name: Fluent Python: Clear, Concise, and Effective Programming
Introducing Python: Modern Computing in Simple Packages

product_info.name: Fluent Python: Clear, Concise, and Effective Programming
product_info.author: Luciano Ramalho
product_info.description: Don't waste time bending Python to fit patterns you've learned in other languages. Python's simplicity lets you become productive quickly, but often this means you aren't using everything the language has to offer. With the updated edition of this hands-on guide, you'll learn how to write effective, modern Python 3 code by leveraging its best ideas.

product_info.name: Introducing Python: Modern Computing in Simple Packages
product_info.author: Bill Lubanovic
product_info.description: Easy to understand and fun to read, this updated edition of Introducing Python is ideal for beginning programmers as well as those new to the language. Author Bill Lubanovic takes you from the basics to more involved and varied topics, mixing tutorials with cookbook-style code recipes to explain concepts in Python 3. End-of-chapter exercises help you practice what youâve learned.
